alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 13 at 1:02PM AKST until December 15 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 15 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow Thursday morning may reduce visibility and cause large drifts along roadways, especially the Richardson Highway. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall expected from Trims Camp south along the Richardson Highway. Windy conditions Thursday morning from gap winds through passes may further reduce visibility, especially along the highway corridor.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
